title: 106_s3214
content: Excludes funds attributable to matching contributions by qualified entities from IDA emergency withdrawals. Includes among eligible grantees low-income credit unions and community development financial institutions. Revises requirements for withdrawals from IDA accounts for the purchase of a home. Increases the amount of funds set aside for economic literacy training and administrative costs. Includes a Federal poverty measure among alternative eligibility criteria. Declares that funds in an IDA shall be disregarded entirely for purposes of determining eligibility for Federal programs based on need.
